page.title: 05WOODSIDE SURVEY
page.content: Out of the 100 people we interviewed at Woodside shopping centre, 67 of them lived on Woodside. 51 of them rent their houses, leaving 16 home owners. The average amount of time people have lived on Woodside is 9.21 years. 23 people who rent would like to buy their house, and 44 would not. The most popular street is Westbourne. The most popular improvement to be suggested on Waltondale was for dogs to be controlled.The most popular improvements on Wantage are for more shops,for the rubbish to be cleared away and for quicker buses.The most common improvements to be suggested for the estate as a whole were more tidying up and for some youngsters' areas and activities.
